alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud, Northern Treasure Counties (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 2:18PM MDT until September 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING ALSO REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT SUNDAY... * IMPACTS: Low humidities, hot temperatures, and strong gusty winds will create erratic fire behavior. * AFFECTED AREA: In Southeast MT Fire Zone...130. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Southeast MT...Rosebud...Treasure. * WIND: Today...Southeast 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. Sunday...West to Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES: 98-103 each day.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
